 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵן‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==string== (of harp) (probably loan-word from Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, hair,*** string*** [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>2163</sup>); plural<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנִּים‎</span> [[Ps.150.4|Ps 150:4]], so also probably [[Ps.45.9|Ps 45:9]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנִּים‎</span> for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנִּי‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] [[BDB#We|We]] &gt; [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:87»§ 87</sup>,1.b [[BDB#Hup|Hup]] and others, who think <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנִּי‎</span> an apocopatic plural) II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵן‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנֶּ֑הוּ‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מנן‎</span> 

 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵן‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==portion== (Sim [[BDB#Hup|Hup]] and others); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנֶּה֑וּ‎</span> [[Ps.68.24|Ps 68:24]], but read (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָּ֯‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנָתוֺ‎</span> [[BDB#Ol|Ol]] [[BDB#Dy|Dy]] [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#We|We]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנָת‎</span> above). — [[Ps.45.9|Ps 45:9]]; [[Ps.150.4|Ps 150:4]] see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵן‎</span> above
